data.title: Bridgette Wilson | Bio, Age, Patrimonio, Relationship, Career –
data.meta_description: Miss Teen USA in 1990 was Bridgette Wilson, a former American actress, singer, and model. She played Lisa Fenimore on the soap opera Santa Barbara. The
data.text:
Miss Teen USA in 1990 was Bridgette Wilson, a former American actress, singer, and model. She played Lisa Fenimore on the soap opera Santa Barbara.

The former ATP tennis player Pete Sampras is the actor’s husband; they have two sons together, Christian Charles Sampras and Ryan Nikolaos Sampras.

What is the Net Worth of Bridgette Wilson? Salary, Earnings

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Bridgette Wilson, 46, has a net worth of $25 million a partir de 2020. She has a gorgeous property in Bel Air, California, with her husband Pete Sampras, which they paid $6 million for in 2014.

A house in Brentwood, Los Angeles, that the couple also owned was sold in 2017 for $7.5 million. The home features seven bathrooms and six bedrooms.

A luxury car, a Mercedes-Benz G500, is also one of their possessions. As of 2020, Pete Sampras, her spouse, was worth $150 million.

Where was Bridgette Wilson born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, and Education

On September 25, 1973, Bridgette Wilson was born in Gold Beach, Oregon, in the United States to parents Dale Wilson. Wilson, Kathy, and Wilson Sisters of Dale Wilson exist.

She has American citizenship and Caucasian ancestry. She is 54 kg tall and 5 feet 9 inches wide. Wilson has a history in education, having attended Gold Beach High School and graduating in 1991. While still in high school, Wilson played volleyball for the college team.

Bridget Wilson is married. The Santa Barbara celebrity is wed to former ATP tennis great Pete Sampras. The couple wed on September 30, 2000, in a lavish ceremony in front of their close friends, family, and co-stars. They have been enjoying being married ever since.

Is Bridgette Wilson Single? Relationship

The couple’s boys are Christian Charles Sampras, born on November 21, 2002, and Ryan Nikolaos Sampras, born on July 29, 2005.

When Sampras saw Wilson for the first time at a Los Angeles movie theater in 1999, their enchanting love story officially began. He described what had happened as follows:

I half-jokedly said to my friend, “I’d love to meet her,” in response.

He claims that one of his coworkers set up the two on a date and introduced them. Eventually, their courtship developed into an undeniable romance, and they wed in 2000. Currently, the family calls Bel Air, California, home.

How did Bridgette Wilson start her Professional Career?

After being crowned Miss Teen USA three years prior, Bridgette Wilson started her acting career.

In the 1993 fantasy action-comedy last Action Hero, starring Charles Dance, Austin O’Brien, Mercedes Ruehl, and Arnold Schwarzenegger, she made her acting debut as Whitney/Meredith.

Wilson co-starred with Marcy Walker, A Martinez, Lane Davies, and Robin Wright in the popular NBC soap series Santa Barbara from April 1992 to January 1993 as Lisa Fenimore.

Since then, she has had other television appearances, including those in the episodes of Murder, She Wrote, Saved By The Bell, The Street, and Carpoolers.

Her filmography includes roles in films including Billy Madison, Mortal Kombat, Nixon, I Know What You Did Last Summer, House on Haunted Hill, Buying the Cow, The Suburbans & Love Stinks, Sweet Evil, Extreme Ops, and The Wedding Planner.

She has additionally made a guest appearance on a CSI Miami episode.
